Title: Osakana wa Ami no Naka
Description: [Osakana wa Ami no Naka, ' is a story based on manga by Nekokichi Ranma about Tsukamoto Yuuji, a young businessman and great swimmer, and Matsui Takahiro, who is still attending school and is also a beginner in swimming.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: AniDB)']
